about_the_game:
"Space Expedition is an old-school platformer game that mixes different styles of play. It tells the story of a brave astronaut who wants to find out what happened on a faraway space station.

Space Adventure
Explore new places, solve puzzles, avoid traps, fight monsters, use machines, and fly spaceships—all in a pixel-art world! You’ll need to be smart to finish tasks, quick to escape danger, sharp to get past obstacles, and brave to fight enemies. This game is for real heroes! Get ready, put on your space suit, and charge your jetpack—the quest begins!

Main Features
  • Atmospheric Exploration: Enjoy a world with unique areas, beautiful landscapes, and strange creatures that spark your curiosity.
  • Engaging Puzzles: Use your brain and problem-solving skills as you interact with the world, move objects, and work with the planet’s native creatures to move forward.
  • Intuitive PC Controls: Play smoothly with easy-to-use controls made for PC, making your time in the alien world as fun as possible.
  • Captivating Soundscapes: Lose yourself in the rich sound experience of Space Expedition, featuring an original soundtrack and sound design that matches the game’s look and feel.
  • Mysterious Story: Learn the story of the alien planet as you explore its unknown areas. Find hidden artifacts, old ruins, and secret messages that show the world’s secrets and your purpose there.

A Decade of Fun
Originally released 10 years ago, Space Expedition has won the hearts of many players worldwide. Now, this classic game is free on Steam, allowing new players to enjoy it.

Prepare for an unforgettable trip that goes beyond space and time. Learn the mysteries of the cosmos and explore an alien world full of wonder and excitement. Will you take the challenge and find the secrets of this mysterious place?

Experience the Adventure
Space Expedition is a game that keeps you on your toes. From dodging traps to fighting monsters, there is never a dull moment. Each level is carefully designed to test your skills and keep you engaged. Whether you are solving puzzles or piloting spaceships, you will always find something new and exciting to do.

A World of Wonder
The game world is full of unique biomes and mesmerizing landscapes that will captivate you. The pixel-art graphics and original soundtrack create an immersive experience that draws you in. As you progress through the game, you will uncover hidden artifacts, ancient ruins, and cryptic messages that reveal the planet's secrets and your purpose within it.

Join the Adventure
Space Expedition has been a favorite for many players over the past decade. Now, with its release on Steam for free, a new generation of players can experience its charm. Get ready to explore an alien world filled with wonder and intrigue. Will you rise to the challenge and uncover the secrets of this mysterious place?"

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.16
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Space Expedition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512mb vram
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512mb vram
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Space Expedition is a 2D sci-fi platformer where you play as an astronaut who is sent to a space station to collect samples of mysterious dark matter. Space Expedition combines puzzle platforming, pixel art, and atmospheric adventures set in the style of 1980s sci-fi horror films.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
